title: Blacksad: Under the Skin
brief_description: BLACKSAD: Under the Skin - A dark corruption scandal in the heart of the New York City’s underworld for charismatic detective John Blacksad!

constellations_other.name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
constellations_other.description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

description: In 1950s New York, Joe Dunn, the owner of a humble boxing club is found hanged. At the same time, Robert Yale, his protege and greatest hope, is reported missing. Although overwhelmed by these terrible events, Joe Dunn’s daughter, Sonia, decides to continue working towards her father’s dreams: she takes over the boxing club and calls on John Blacksad to investigate this mysterious disappearance. It’s the eve of the fight of the year and the club, which is in serious financial difficulties, will not survive Robert’s withdrawal. The investigation will lead John Blacksad to the very heart of a world in which corruption reigns supreme.
